Body: Possible Duplicate:  How can I deduce an app from a notification icon?  I get strange messages (see link, chinese). It's not related to any mail account I synchronize, nor a SMS message. It might come from some app I installed but I have no idea.If I click on I get a white screen and I get the SIM01 symbol in the notification area. Clicking the back button brings me back to the home screen. But several hours later I get the same message again.
Title: Does anyone know this icon?

history.Text: I get strange messages (see link, chinese). It's not related to any mail account I synchronize, nor a SMS message. It might come from some app I installed but I have no idea.If I click on I get a white screen and I get the SIM01 symbol in the notification area. Clicking the back button brings me back to the home screen. But several hours later I get the same message again.Any ideas?http://dl.dropbox.com/u/947796/2013-02-01%2012.29.41.png

I get strange messages (see link, chinese). It's not related to any mail account I synchronize, nor a SMS message. It might come from some app I installed but I have no idea.If I click on I get a white screen and I get the SIM01 symbol in the notification area.
